column2: Plan, produce, and edit multimedia content in English, including videos, podcasts, and interactive media.     Ensure alignment of multimedia content with brand guidelines and target audience preferences.     Manage multimedia projects, timelines, and budgets effectively.     Collaborate with writers and content creators to develop compelling multimedia concepts and storyboards.     Stay updated on multimedia trends, tools, and technologies for continuous improvement.     Coordinate and direct multimedia production teams and external vendors.     Optimize multimedia content for various digital platforms and devices.     Conduct quality checks and ensure accuracy of multimedia content in English.     Track and analyze multimedia performance metrics to drive content enhancements.     Contribute to the development and implementation of multimedia strategies and initiatives.     Manage multimedia assets, including storage, organization, and archival processes.     Provide guidance and support on multimedia best practices and technical requirements.     Participate in brainstorming sessions and idea generation for multimedia projects.     Collaborate with marketing and communication teams to align multimedia content with campaigns and initiatives.     Coordinate localization and translation processes for multimedia content.             Required Qualifications:        Bachelors degree in Multimedia Production, Film, Media Studies, or related field.     Demonstrated experience in multimedia production and content creation, particularly in an English language context.     Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.     Strong understanding of storytelling, visual communication, and multimedia design principles.     Excellent project management skills with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.     Knowledge of multimedia formats, codecs, and distribution platforms.     Experience in optimizing multimedia content for SEO and web best practices.     Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced, creative environment.     Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills for effective team collaboration and client interaction.     Keen eye for detail and a passion for creating impactful multimedia content.     Understanding of copyright and intellectual property considerations in multimedia production.     Proficiency in English grammar, writing, and language conventions.     Experience with audio production and editing software is a plus.     Knowledge of data analytics and multimedia performance measurement tools.

column2: Senior Project Manager, Media Reports to: Delivery Team Leader (Media) Purpose:? Client-facing, liaison between Sales and Operations colleagues, managing client projects and internally coordinating with diverse media services to deliver clients solutions Specific Skills & Experience required: Excellent spoken and written communication skills in English [+ other language as defined in org charts] and proven successful experience in a client face role for at least one year Proven successful experience as a project manager, delivering complex client analytical projects, using project management platforms and managing diverse stakeholders High level of competence using Business Intelligence tools/platforms, especially Microsofts PowerBI Multiple years experience using Python and SQL to extract and manipulate data from a variety of sources Bachelor's degree or equivalent in a subject where both extensive written and verbal communication skills and advanced mathematical analytical skills are key Strong understanding of the global media ecosystem, how it is measured, and how advertisers and media platforms interact Tasks And Responsibilities Building trust and long-term relationships with defined clients Develop an understanding of our client's challenges and needs, and the solutions that help them achieve their business objectives. Being an expert in Nielsen Sports tools and the product portfolio. You'll continuously expand your knowledge of our clients, the sports business landscape, and the media and advertising industry to provide the most effective solutions to our clients. Use existing project planning tools, such as ROSCO, project management and capacity planning tools (Monday.com), to implement and track your own projects.? You'll manage simple to medium projects and work under guidance on complex projects, and provide scope, cost calculations, and feasibility checks for simple to medium projects. Working closely with all media operations teams at Nielsen Sports, relaying information to the appropriate team to align client projects and meet service-level agreements. You'll also collaborate on projects with other Solutions groups, where applicable. Contributing to the continuous improvement of our services and products by adopting and implementing automation of our processes and services. You'll also be responsible for the profitability of your projects, ensuring that they meet or exceed budget expectations. Independently analysing information and presenting to clients with experienced team members. You'll be able to analyse data and turn the results into compelling stories that deliver meaningful insights and added value to our clients.
column11: Project Manager, foreign language, project delivery, business analyst

column1: Lead Software Engineer  Media Streaming Specialist
column2: The Media Streaming Specialist will be responsible for building and supporting business critical AV and Non AV related cloud solutions for on-demand and live streaming. The person with high-energy, detail-oriented, capable of taking on multiple projects, and working with the cross-functional teams and highly self-managed position. This is an all-hands-on-deck team in an extremely fast-paced setting.  Qualifications Expertise in encoding profiles, bitrate ladders, and video compression technologies. Expertise in audio/video codecs (AVC/HEVC/DD+, Atmos), HDR (HDR10/Dolby Vision), 4k, DRM technologies (Fairplay, Playready, Widevine, BuyDRM). Expertise in dynamic ad insertion, both client-side and server-side, technical architecture and design implications for each. Expertise in cloud VOD transcode and packaging services. Knowledge of VOD video workflows in the cloud and in on-prem/off-prem environments. Knowledge of streaming acceleration with CDNs (AWS or AZURE is a plus). Knowledge of streaming video delivery, video origin architecture, and issues of scale for video delivery. Knowledge of Kaltura and/or Wowza streaming delivery platform Knowledge of low latency streaming is a plus Strong quantitative, analytical, problem solving, debugging and decision-making skills. 5-7 years of experience working in video delivery   Skillset Requirements Experience with the following technologies C#.NET,       ASP.NET, WCF,       Core Java HTML5,       CSS3, JavaScript & JQuery MySQL/MSSQL Nginx,       Kaltura VOD, Wowza Streaming Server Must be highly process oriented.
column11: Media Industry, Video delivery, Delivery streaming Platform, Drm Technologies, Wowza
